name: Lemeor
tagline: We create apps & websites to grow your business.
description:
Lemeor is a web and mobile development company tailored to a global market. Our team includes developers, designers, marketers, and project managers who are top players in the technology market.
We deliver each service on-time, and on-budget, making sure all customers’ need has been met. Our clientele has included a wide range of companies from startups to large companies. We are people-orientated, and doing our best to make the process of collaboration with us positive and tasteful for our partners. It’s personal, and not just a business!
